name: The Last Shuttle
description:
The Last shuttle is a game where you must fight your way through the alien armada to find a home for humanity among the stars!

Controls:

LMB or SPACE BAR = Shoot

Q=Strafe Right

E=Strafe Left

W=Forward

A=Left

D=Right

S=Down

1=Prime Double fire

2=Activate Shields

The game will be receiving updates in the future, which could include:

- Boss Battles

- Multiple Waves

- New Enemy Types

- Endless Mode

- Controller Support

- Menu

- Settings (including things such as audio adjustment and controller suppor

- And Much More!

(Note: Subject to change)

Please leave thoughts and your feedback in the comments down below, as any information helps with the development of the game!
